<template>
	<v-container fluid class="content-contain">
		<v-card max-width="60%">
			<GChart 
			type="LineChart"
			:data="chartData"
			:options="chartOptions">
		</GChart>

	</v-card>

	</v-container>

	
</template>
<script>
	import axios from "axios"
	export default {
		name: 'SentimentGraph',
		data() {
			return {
				chartData: [],
				chartOptions: {
					chart: {
						title: 'Average Sentiment by Week',
					},
					curveType: 'function',
					// vAxis: {
					// 	maxValue: 1.00001, 
					// 	minValue: -1.0001
					// }
				}
			}
		},
		mounted() {
			const path = "http://localhost:8081/sentiment_date"
			axios({
				method: "GET",
				url: path,
			}).then(response => (this.chartData = response.data))
		}

		// 				}

	}
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>
	.content-contain {
		display: flex;
		justify-content: center;
		max-width: 90%;
		min-height:100%;
	}

	</style>
